chapter.subject: double negation operator !!
chapter.content:
/ double negation operator allows you to flip values twice as exmaples below (Important it always converts to Boolean)
-------------for strings ------------------ const emptyString = ''; //empty string is treated as false or undefined but it empty string in real !emptyString //return true !!emptyString //return false !!!emptyString //return true and so on and so on -----------------
-------------for object ------------------ const emptyObject = {}; //empty Object is defined Object so it is true value; !emptyObject //return false !!emptyObject //return true !!!emptyObject //return false and so on and so on -----------------
